attributes.action: regulate the ability of car insurance companies to charge males up to £1000 more than females in car insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a large issue for younger drivers, but hits learner drivers the hardest as it is nearly impossible for a male to get car insurance for less than £1700, whereas females have no trouble getting insurance for less than £1000. I believe that this is discrimination against younger male drivers and in some way this should be prevented.
Your support is vital.
